Name: The Shattered Elements Arena
About the game: - Top down view, controller based 2D physics action - Engaging maneuvering using both joysticks - Four elements and a dozen unique incarnations to play with, both human and animal - Up to four player local co-op or remote play using Steam - Random, procedurally generated indie art environment with original music - Enhance your mage throughout your journey by picking up items - Four zones to traverse with different enemies and bosses
